title: Codec
short: My own discord bot to keep me company when no one comes to talk to me :'(
description: Codec is my own discord bot that I made to manage futur servers, try out new Discord API features and more.
This bot is more of a personal test project than anything else, but I still wanted to share it.
The entire bot is written in NodeJS, using the discord.js library. All the source code is available on my GitHub, by clicking on the link below.
